summary: Completed Loop 004 HabitPulse QA placeholder coverage with additive, backward-compatible streak edge-case checks and contract field constraints; prior loop outputs remain accepted. QA artifact work was delivered in commits 93876d6, 3e8b61e, and f324bae, with orchestration handoff finalized in commit 393970c.
risks: Checklist and contract spec are documentation-level artifacts and are not yet backed by executable automated tests.
Timezone and DST behavior is specified in QA notes but still depends on implementation consistency in downstream services.
